Flow.description: v2/3/4 - Updated lost opp Slack message v5 - Updated setting Account AE to AE's email instead of AE's name v6 - Copy Forecast Category to Type v7 - Added auto set product instance on POC v8 - Fixed forecast copying bug v9/10 - Removed closed won slack alert v11 - Removed slack alert and fixed opp type bug v13 - Copy SEs to Account v14 - Added Sales Pod copy v15 - Removed slack alerts that moved to Rattle v16 - Added Renewal Forecast update v17 - Moved Account owner assignment to only apply to New Business opps v18 - Deal Flag checkboxes
